nominee.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who has been officially suggested for an important position, duty, or prize
nominee.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a nominee for the post of vice president
nominee.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who has been suggested for a job, position, or prize
nominee.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Board nominees must be approved by shareholders.
nominee.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a person or organization that holds shares, bonds etc for someone
nominee.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: What is there to prevent a taxpayer from putting his shares in the name of a nominee?
nominee.translation[1].definitions[2].de: in LIFE INSURANCE, the name of the person who will get money if the insured person dies
